Good Afternoon everyone,

DEPHER stood for!
"Disabled and Elderly Plumbing and Heating Emergency Repair" - as we are now branching the company to more of a open plumbing service that helps more than the disabled and elderly we thought this was much needed as we received phonecalls and emails asking do we help this person or can we help this other person we want the company to stand for everybody that needs us, hence the new name

" Community Plumbing &Heating "
